title: Remote Leadership Mentor – Sales & Marketing Pathway
description:
**Redefine Your Career: Remote Leadership & Business Growth Role**
 You’ve built a strong career—led teams, achieved results, and ticked the corporate boxes—yet still wonder if there’s more.
   

  

 If you’re an accomplished professional with 15+ years of experience (including 5+ in leadership, management, or executive capacity) and you’re curious about new directions, flexible remote opportunities, or stepping away from the rigid 9–5, this could be the shift you’ve been waiting for.
   

  

 We are part of a fast-growing international organisation in the Personal Development industry—valued at USD 48 billion and projected to exceed USD 67 billion by 2030. Our business model includes online learning programs, leadership development, and live global events. With a digital-first system and a streamlined 3-step framework, we empower professionals worldwide to create lasting impact and success.
   

  

 🌟
 **Why Professionals Choose This Path**
* Lifestyle by Design – Work remotely, set your own schedule, and take control of your time.
* Lead with Purpose – Use your expertise to make a positive difference.
* High Potential Rewards – Commission-based income structure with no ceiling.
* Put Your Skills to Work – Apply your leadership, strategy, and communication experience in a new way.
* Guidance & Support – Access training, advanced digital tools (including AI-driven marketing), and a global peer network.


 🔧
 **What You’ll Be Doing**
* Running digital marketing campaigns (training provided, no prior ad experience necessary)
* Engaging with warm, pre-qualified leads using a proven business framework
* Expanding your personal brand and professional influence
* Participating in leadership and mindset development programs
* Collaborating with a diverse international team of growth-focused individuals


**✅ This Could Suit You If You**
* Bring 15+ years of professional expertise, with 5+ in leadership or senior management
* Are seeking greater freedom and flexibility in your next career step
* Thrive in a results-driven environment where you control the pace
* Have experienced redundancy, burnout, or a shift in priorities—and want a fresh start
* Value growth, independence, and being rewarded for outcomes, not hours


 📌
 **Important Details**
**This is an independent contractor role with a commission-only compensation model. It’s not a salaried position and isn’t suited for recent graduates or those not open to entrepreneurial pathways.**
**🔥 Is This the Career Shift You’ve Been Searching For?**
**Apply today to explore how leadership, flexibility, and purpose can come together to redefine your career.**

title: Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
Education changes lives. But tech hasn’t lived up to its promise for the more than 1 billion students in school around the world — at least not yet. At Kognity, we’re here to change that.
 



  





 We’re a 125-person EdTech scale-up powering learning in 120+ countries. Our intelligent platform replaces traditional textbooks and combines rich, interactive pedagogy with smart AI and data to help students and teachers thrive — from international schools to US high schools.
 



  





 We’re growing, and our People team is now looking for a
 **Talent Acquisition Specialist** 
 who’s ready to help us find (and welcome!) amazing new Kognites. If you love meeting new people, running smooth hiring processes, all while growing your HR knowledge, you might be exactly who we need.
 



  





**Why Kognity is the place to be:** 




  




* ✨ Educational Innovation – Build AI-driven solutions that actually make learning better.
* 🌍 Global Reach – Our platform supports educators and learners in over 120 countries.
* 🤝 Driven Culture – Work with brilliant, hard-working people who care deeply about what they do.
* 📈 Real Growth – In every role at Kognity, you will be expected to grow.



  





**What you’ll do:** 




  




* 🎯
 **Hiring –** 
 You’ll run end-to-end recruitment processes, from drafting job ads and sourcing talent, to making offers. You’ll make sure candidates feel welcome and excited to join us.
* 💬
 **Be a trusted partner to our hiring managers –** 
 Help them shape roles, run smooth interview processes and make great hiring decisions.
* 📝
 **Keep our people operations running smoothly** 
 – Maintain accurate data, contracts, payroll inputs and systems so everything stays on track.
* 🎉
 **Create smooth first (and last) days –** 
 Make sure onboarding and offboarding are welcoming, clear and positive.



  





**What we’re looking for:** 




  




* 💻
 **Previous experience in end-to-end recruitment, owning the full process –** 
 with a strong emphasis on sourcing and engaging top talent.
* 🎤
 **A people person & strong communicator –** 
 You keep candidates informed and hiring managers supported.
* 🚀
 **Proactive & solutions-focused –** 
 You spot what needs doing and jump in without waiting.
* 📝
 **Organised & detail-oriented –** 
 You keep processes structured and clear, making it easy for others to follow along and trust that the details are right.
* 🌟
 **Curious about all things people –** 
 While your main focus will be hiring, you’re excited to learn more about HR in an international company.
* **🌍 Fluent written and spoken English –** 
 Swedish is not a requirement.
* 🚀
 **A curious, open-minded approach to AI** 
 — you enjoy using tools like ChatGPT, Claude or Gemini to push your work further and faster.



  





**Our Interview process** 




  





 Our hiring process is all about you. Show us your skills, tackle real-world challenges, and get a real feel for life at Kognity. Expect case studies, honest conversations, and plenty of chances to shine.
 



  




1. **Hiring Manager hangout** 
 - connect with the team lead to dive deeper.
2. **Case study** 
 : Work on solving real-world recruitment and HR related tasks.
3. **Values Interview** 
 : Share your experiences and ways of thinking in relation to our values.
4. **Leadership discussion** 
 : Connect with our CEO to talk about big ideas, bold vision, and where you could grow with us.



  





**Our Values** 




  




* 🤖
 **We leverage AI –** 
 We apply AI to enhance creativity, decisions, and execution to allow for impact maximisation.
* **👊 We take ownership** 
 - We take initiative and solve problems we see.
* **🤝 We drive customer value** 
 - Success for our customers means success for us.
* **🗣️ We are transparent** 
 - No secrets, no mysteries. We're the open book of opinions and feedback. Radical transparency is our thing, and we're not shy about sharing information far and wide
* **💙 We take care of ourselves and each other** 
 - We work hard and passionately. We also prioritise our well-being and that of our colleagues. We think long-term.



  





**Benefits** 




  




* 🏡 Truly Hybrid — work from our Stockholm office when you like.
* 💰 ITP Pension Plan with Nordnet
* 🧘 Yearly budget of 5,000 SEK to spend on health-related services.
* 🏖️ 30 days of paid vacation every year
* 🤒 Full pay sick leave starting on day 1



  





 Every qualified person will be evaluated regardless of age, gender, identity, nationality, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability status or religion. We’re committed to building a diverse, inclusive team and welcome people of all backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and abilities.

title: Sales Manager
description:
**Step into the role**
 MilDef is in an exciting growth phase where we are developing our sales business and strengthening it with new skills, experiences, and perspectives. For the Nordic & Baltic region we are forming a team shaped around the competencies of both our current and future teammates, a team that collaborates across borders. This is a unique opportunity to be part of something new, from the very beginning.
   

  

 We are recruiting several colleagues to our offices in Stockholm, Oslo, Copenhagen and Helsingborg. Whether you are at the start of your career or already experienced, this is your chance to grow with us. The role can be tailored to your profile, but what unites us is that you will play a key role in our continued journey. You will report to the Head of Sales Nordics & Baltics; this is an individual contributor role with no managerial responsibility.
   

  

 At MilDef, we work globally and closely with our customers to deliver rugged IT solutions for the highest defence and security demands. Our customers are chiefly located European and NATO-allied countries. Our customers span both the enterprise (B2B) and government (B2G) sectors – where long-term partnerships, framework agreements, and complex sales processes define the way we work. We are now looking for colleagues with sharp expertise in procurement and sales within the security and defence sector, or experience from the buyer’s side of such processes. Your insights and background will be invaluable as we strengthen our Nordics & Baltics Business Development and Sales team.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Identify and drive business opportunities across sales, partnerships, and collaborations.
* Build and develop long-term customer relationships in both new and existing markets.
* Contribute to marketing activities through networking, events, and customer dialogues.
* Work cross-functionally with colleagues in technology, product development, and
* Project management to create tailored solutions.
* Represent MilDef externally and act as an ambassador for our brand.


**What You Bring**
* Experience from sales or business development.
* Background from enterprise (B2B) or government (B2G) sales is highly valued.
* Up to date network in one or several of the Nordic Armed Forces and their procurement agencies.
* Strong relationship-building skills and the ability to establish trust, internally and externally.
* Commercial mindset with an understanding of how to grow business.
* Expertise in procurement processes, sales within security and defence, or experience from the purchasing or contracting side is considered an asset.
* Experience from technology or the IT sector is considered an asset.
* Flexibility and willingness to shape a new role and contribute to building a strong team.


**Get to know us**
 At MilDef, you'll be part of a company that values hands-on involvement and cross-functional collaboration. We offer the opportunity to develop new skills, contribute to a variety of projects, and make a tangible impact on our business's success.
   

  

 If you're driven and ready for a challenging and rewarding role, apply now!
   

  

 Do you want to know more about us? MilDef.com
   

  

 For further information, please contact Linnéa Blixt, HR or Elin Hovbrandt, HR.
   

  

**Recruitment process and important information**
 We kindly ask all applicants to complete our application form and, for these roles, also respond to a set of selected screening questions. As we are recruiting for several different profiles and backgrounds, these answers will help us better understand your experience and interests.
   

  

 Please note that background checks and drug tests are conducted on all future colleagues prior to employment. For this role, any of the Nordic citizenships is required.
   

  

 We kindly but firmly decline contact from external recruiters, as this recruitment is managed internally.
   

  

***MilDef - WE ARMOR IT.***
*MilDef is a global systems integrator and full-spectrum provider specializing in rugged IT solutions for defense and security domains. MilDef provides hardware, software and services that shield and protect critical information streams and systems, when and where the stakes are the highest.
   

  

 MilDef’s products are sold to more than 200 customers through companies in Sweden, Norway, Finland, Denmark, United Kingdom, Germany, Switzerland, the United States and Australia. MilDef was founded in 1997 and is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm since 2021.*
**We kindly decline contact from advertising and recruitment sales.**

title: Teknisk Maximo
description:
*Nexer fortsätter sin framgångsresa och nu söker vi ännu fler kollegor till vårt team på Asset Management. Nexer är ett privat och familjeägt IT-konsultbolag med kontor över hela världen. Vårt mål är att hjälpa våra kunder att alltid ligga steget före och i framkant i sina digitala resor. Om du vill vara en del av en familjär företagskultur och är intresserad av en varierad arbetsmiljö inom olika branscher, då kan detta vara rätt för dig!*
*Vi söker nu en etablerad
 **Maximo-konsult** 
 med teknisk bakgrund som vill vara med på vår resa mot att bli framtidens techbolag! Om du inte arbetar som konsult idag men är nyfiken på rollen, tveka ändå inte att söka.*
**Hur ser rollen ut?**
*Som konsult på Nexer Asset Management arbetar du nära kunden i förvaltning och projekt kring underhållssystemet Maximo.*
*Du kommer använda dina erfarenheter till att kravställa, implementera och anpassa systemet till att stödja kundens verksamhet. Du blir en del vår grupp som består av systemspecialister inom Enterprise Asset Management och Asset Lifecycle Management så som exempelvis lösningsarkitekter, applikationsspecialister, utvecklare och serviceledare.*
*Du spelar en viktig roll i vår leverans av kravhantering, design av lösningar, utbildning och utveckling av våra kunders Maximo-installationer. I rollen ingår att samarbeta med kollegor och andra partners och i dina uppdrag kommer du att arbeta proaktivt med att identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter. Våra leveranser sker i huvudsak från våra egna kontor, men att arbeta på plats hos våra kunder är ett självklart inslag i vår vardag.*
***Krav***
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av implementering och konfigurering av Maximo
* Relevant utbildning eller motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet
* Talar svenska och engelska obehindrat


***Meriterande***
* Arbetat med MAS
* Arbetat som teknisk projektledare
* Kunskap inom befintliga verktyg och tekniker inom olika AI-lösningar


***För att trivas i rollen ser vi att***
*Du har erfarenhet av underhållssystemet Maximo och gärna MAS, har förmågan att förstå och formulera hur arbetssätt ställer krav på ett underhållssystem. Vi ser det meriterande om du är bekant med befintliga verktyg och tekniker inom AI-området om har börjat gräva lite i hur man kan integrerar olika AI-lösningar för att skapa affärsnytta*
*I din roll ser vi att du med engagemang och drivkraft har som mål att skapa och underhåller långsiktiga relationer mellan kunden och Nexer.*
*Dina personliga egenskaper är viktiga för oss och våra medarbetare kännetecknas av en affärsmässig och kundorienterad attityd, samt förmåga att snabbt ta till sig ny information och omvandla den till kreativa lösningar. Du har lätt för att samarbeta med andra och har en stark vilja att dela med dig av dina kunskaper till andra samt lyssna och lära.* 
*Sist men inte minst, känner du att en miljö som speglas av starkt entreprenörskap, egenutveckling och framåtanda är detta en plats för dig!*
***Ansökan***
*Vi hanterar löpande de ansökningar som kommer in, så varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan nu! Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl men har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta oss rekryterande chef Jörgen Bergström,
 *jorgen.bergstrom@nexergroup.com* 
 .*
**Nexer som arbetsgivare**
 Om du jobbar på Nexer får du en djärv och entreprenöriell arbetsgivare med internationell närvaro. Vi är stolta över att leda den digitala revolutionen och ligga i teknikens framkant, alltid med ett agilt och framåtblickande förhållningssätt. Hos oss får du unika möjligheter att drömma stort, agera smart och utvecklas. Som familjeföretag äger vi vår strategi och investerar i långsiktiga mål, och vi uppmuntrar medarbetarnas engagemang och idéer. Dessutom erbjuder vi en flexibel arbetspolicy, där det är möjligt att arbeta på distans när det passar dig och ditt uppdrag.
   

  

**Vår kultur**
 Vår vision är Promising future - det är viktigt för oss att göra skillnad och bidra till en bättre framtid. Vi är engagerade i våra kunder och har en uppriktig omsorg om varandra. Vi omfamnar mångfald och tror att människor med olika bakgrund och erfarenheter gör vårt arbete och vårt företag bättre. Vi värdesätter innovation och viljan att utvecklas och ta nästa steg, framåt och uppåt. Och viktigast av allt - vi har roligt på jobbet!

title: Projektledare
description:
Vår kund söker nu en Projektledare, kompetensnivå 3.
   

  

 Projektledaren ansvarar för att planera och driva processen för ett nytt IT-stöd för rekrytering och on-boarding inom Region Stockholm. Rollen innebär att:
   

  

* Planera och driva projektet framåt, säkerställa att tidsplan och mål hålls
* Utveckla en implementeringsplan för övergången till nytt system
* Vara särskilt ansvarig för IT-kravställning
* Samordna projektets olika delar och hålla intressenter informerade
* Leda möten och workshops
* Motivera och vägleda arbetet för att definiera och enas om krav och processer


**Krav**
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av upphandlings- och införandeprojekt av applikation/system, inklusive arbete med kravfångst
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att leda projekt inom offentlig sektor
* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av applikationsförvaltningstjänster
* Minst 1 referensuppdrag (minst 6 månader, inte äldre än 3 år) som motsvarar rollen


**Mervärdeskrav**
* Erfarenhet av arbete inom Region Stockholms organisation och projektmetodik
* Genomförandebeskrivning som visar på insikt, förståelse och tydliga framgångsfaktorer för uppdraget
* Intervju – bedömning av analytisk, problemlösande, ansvarstagande, kommunikativ och pedagogisk förmåga

title: Tech Lead till Ramudden Global Products & Digital AB
description:
*Vill du leda teknikutveckling som gör skillnad på riktigt? Som Tech Lead hos Ramudden Global får du chansen att ta en central roll i utvecklingen av vår molnbaserade plattform för device management – en lösning som bidrar till ökad trafiksäkerhet världen över. Här kombinerar du strategiskt ansvar med hands-on kodning och får möjlighet att driva innovation i en modern teknikmiljö tillsammans med ett dedikerat team.*
**Din vardag:**
 Vi söker nu en
 **Tech Lead** 
 till vårt Global Platform Team i Stockholm. Rollen innebär att du blir drivande i att forma den tekniska riktningen för en plattform som hanterar digitala enheter globalt. Plattformen samlar olika hårdvarukomponenter, möjliggör enhetlig hantering av statusförändringar och integreras med externa tjänster – allt för att skapa smarta, pålitliga och skalbara lösningar.
   

  

 Som Tech Lead ansvarar du för helheten, från arkitektur och systemdesign till kodning och implementation. Du blir den som visar vägen framåt, säkerställer att vi ligger rätt tekniskt och inspirerar ditt team att nå nästa nivå.
   

  

**Teknikstack:**
* Backend: .NET 9.0, C#
* Frontend: React, TypeScript
* Databaser: PostgreSQL, PostGIS
* Data & analys: Stitch, DBT, Snowflake, Power BI
* Molnmiljö: Azure (bl.a. Service Bus, Container Apps)
* Arkitekturprinciper: Clean Architecture, CQRS, Domain-Driven Design, Event-Driven Architecture
* DevOps-verktyg: Docker, GitHub Actions, Infrastructure as Code (Bicep)


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har en stark teknisk bakgrund och ett naturligt intresse för att leda och utveckla team. Du har ett agilt tankesätt och vill bidra till teamets och plattformens fortsatta utveckling. Du har flera års erfarenhet av objektorienterad programmering, exempelvis i C#, Java och backendutveckling, och är van att arbeta med systemarkitektur och mjukvarudesign för distribuerade system samt en god förståelse för hur olika tekniska delar samverkar i en helhetslösning.
   

  

**Utöver detta ser vi gärna att du:**
* Förstår och tillämpar principer som Clean Architecture och Domain-Driven Design
* Har erfarenhet av testautomatisering och CI/CD-processer
* Gillar att bygga lösningar som integrerar hårdvara – ett plus om du har teknikintresse även utanför jobbet


**Det är meriterande om du har:**
* Erfarenhet av IoT eller device management-system
* Erfarenhet av data pipelines eller samarbete med data engineering-team
* Erfarenhet av PostgreSQL/PostGIS


**Passar vi för dig?**
 Ramudden Global Products & Digital AB är en ledande aktör inom tillfälliga trafikanordningar (TTM) för kritisk infrastruktur. Genom att kombinera uthyrning av trafiksäkerhetsutrustning med digitala lösningar och tjänster skapar vi tryggare miljöer världen över.
   

  

 Vi finns i 13 länder, har över 5 000 medarbetare och en årlig omsättning på cirka 1 miljard euro. Vårt uppdrag – att alla ska komma hem säkert varje dag – genomsyrar hela vår verksamhet.
   

  

 Vi tror på kraften i samarbete, innovation och hållbar utveckling. Hos oss bidrar du till en säkrare värld genom att tänka nytt och arbeta tillsammans med engagerade kollegor.
   

  

**Ansökan & kontakt**
 Vi på Ramudden arbetar varje dag för att säkerställa trygga arbetsmiljöer. Därför ingår alkohol- och drogtest samt bakgrundskontroll i vår rekryteringsprocess. Tjänsten rekryteras i samarbete med Wise IT. Har du frågor, kontakta rekryteringskonsult Alexandra Karlsson på alexandra.karlsson@wiseit.se.
   

  

 Observera att vi inte tar emot ansökningar via e-post – ansök istället via annonsen. Urval sker löpande, så vänta inte med din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen att bli en del av ett globalt företag där du gör skillnad – varje dag.

title: OSS Architect
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.
   

  

**Your role**
 You will play a crucial role in designing, optimizing, and supporting Business Support Systems (BSS) and Operations Support Systems (OSS) for the telecommunications industry.
   

  

*In this role, you will play a key role in:*
* Leading the Design, Architecture, and Implementation of BSS and OSS platforms to support telecom operations.
* Ensuring Seamless Integration of BSS systems with OSS platforms
* Monitoring System performance, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing enhancements to optimize efficiency.
* Acting as the Single Point of Contact (SPOC) for customers, ensuring smooth operations and effective issue resolution.
* Conducting Business process analysis to identify automation and optimization opportunities, aligning technical solutions with business objectives.
* Leading or participating in OSS-related projects, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
* Coordinating with BSS/OSS vendors and service providers for system upgrades, bug fixes, and support.
* Generating Reports on system performance, customer behavior, and financial metrics to support decision-making.
* Maintaining detailed documentation of BSS-OSS configurations, procedures, and troubleshooting steps.


**Your profile**
* Strong expertise in BSS/OSS Architecture, Design, and implementation.
* Hands-on experience with Billing, CRM, Order management, Revenue assurance, and service provisioning systems.
* Proficiency in System integration, Troubleshooting, and Performance optimization.
* Familiarity with Telecom operations, Regulatory compliance, and industry best practices.
* Strong Analytical, Problem-solving, and leadership skills.
* Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams and act as a SPOC for customers.
* Swedish citizenship is required


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* Exposure to cutting-edge technologies in the telecom industry, including professional certifications in telecom technologies and BSS/OSS platforms.


**Application**
 As part of our recruitment process, identity verification or background checks may occasionally be conducted.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Ramboll is growing its Rail Power Supply team!
description:
**Job Description**
**Our Growing Rail Power Supply Team in Sweden**
 Are you a professional with strong project experience and technical skills within Rail Power Supply? Ramboll is expanding its Rail Power Supply function and are keen to speak with experienced professionals within this space.
   

  

 Ramboll is a global engineering, architecture, and consultancy company dedicated to creating sustainable and innovative solutions. Our Rail division is a critical part of our efforts to shape the future of transportation infrastructure across the globe.
   

  

 We are inviting passionate and skilled individuals across Sweden to connect with us. If you have expertise in Rail Power Supply, now is the perfect time to explore potential opportunities with Ramboll.
   

  

**Qualifications**
**We are interested in speaking to professionals with:**
* Expertise in power distribution systems and integration within the railway sector
* Strong technical skills in Rail Power Supply systems, e.g. specification, design and implementation of power supply and railway earthing / bonding
* Knowledge and experience in electrical engineering related to rail infrastructure
* Ability to analyse and solve complex technical challenges within rail power system design
* Expert knowledge of relevant industry standards and local regulations.


**Additional Information**
**Why Join Ramboll?**
* Work on pioneering rail projects that push the boundaries of technology and sustainability
* Collaborate with a global network of experts and industry leaders
* Contribute to the development of cutting-edge solutions in Rail Power Supply.


 Don’t miss the chance to be part of a company that values innovation, excellence, and professional growth. Send your CV via the application link and let’s start the conversation about how you can help shape the future of transportation with Ramboll!

title: Ramboll is growing its Rail Signalling & Telecom team!
description:

**Our Expanding Rail Signalling and Telecom Team in Sweden**
 Are you a professional with strong project experience and technical skills within Rail Signalling and Telecom? Ramboll is expanding its Rail Signalling and Telecom function and is keen to speak with experienced professionals within this space.

 We are inviting passionate and skilled individuals across Sweden to connect with us. If you have expertise in Rail Signalling and Telecom, now is the perfect time to explore potential opportunities with Ramboll.

* Knowledge and experience in electronic engineering related to rail infrastructure

**Additional Information**
**Why Join Ramboll?**
* Work on pioneering rail projects that push the boundaries of technology and sustainability
